item.description: <p>A regional Queensland community is calling for a lifeline with its only childcare centre set to close at the end of the year.</p>

item.title: Lifesavers stretch across the shore of Bondi in a silent vigil to honour victims of terror attack
item.description: <p>&quot;We stand shoulder to shoulder to show we are a united group,&quot; SLS said.</p>

item.title: 'Things have changed since Sunday': NSW Premier announces new hate laws in the wake of Bondi terror attack
item.description: <p>The chant &quot;globalise the intifada&quot; will be banned, with the Minns saying &quot;it encourages violence in our community&quot;.</p>

item.title: 'Really rare find': 20-million-year-old whale fossil discovered at Victorian beach
item.description: <p>A 20-million-year-old whale fossil has been unearthed by a family exploring at Victorian beach.</p>

item.title: Heavily redacted Epstein files make little mention of Donald Trump
item.description: <p>The US Justice Department released thousands of files about convicted sex offender Jeffrey Epstein, but the incomplete document dump did not break significant ground.</p>

item.title: Justice Department begins releasing long-awaited files tied to Epstein sex trafficking investigation
item.description: <p>Hundreds of names have been redacted, but there&#x27;s many photos of the former president.</p>

item.title: Putin tells his annual news conference that the Kremlin's military goals will be achieved in Ukraine
item.description: <p>Speaking at his tightly orchestrated annual news conference, Putin declared that Russian forces have &quot;fully seized strategic initiative&quot; and would make more gains by the year&#x27;s end.</p>

item.title: Breast cancer drug set to be added to Pharmaceutical Benefits Scheme
item.description: <p>Patients with an aggressive form of breast cancer could soon save thousands of dollars every month, as the government prepares to cover the cost of crucial medication. </p>

item.title: 'Pour petrol on the fire': Frydenberg's warning to Victorian premier as pressure mounts for government action
item.description: <p>The former Australian ﻿treasurer, along with Jewish leaders, is calling on Jacinta Allan to ban a planned anti-Zionist rally in Melbourne on Monday.</p>

item.title: Children's author David Walliams denies inappropriate behaviour after publisher drops him
item.description: <p>British children&#x27;s author and comedian David Walliams has denied allegations of inappropriate behaviour after publisher HarperCollins dropped him.</p>

item.title: Today in History - December 21: Teen plane hijacker's bizarre demand
item.description: <p>A US 16-year-old girl hijacked a plane and held the passengers hostage for nine hours on December 21, 1978.</p>
